import api from'./api';export const userService={// Get all users
getAllUsers:()=>api.get('/users'),// Get user by ID
getUserById:id=>api.get("/users/".concat(id)),// Get active users
getActiveUsers:()=>api.get('/users/active'),// Get users by role
getUsersByRole:role=>api.get("/users/role/".concat(role)),// Create new user
createUser:userData=>api.post('/users',userData),// Update user
updateUser:(id,userData)=>api.put("/users/".concat(id),userData),// Update user password
updateUserPassword:(id,passwordData)=>api.put("/users/".concat(id,"/password"),passwordData),// Activate user
activateUser:id=>api.put("/users/".concat(id,"/activate")),// Deactivate user
deactivateUser:id=>api.put("/users/".concat(id,"/deactivate")),// Delete user
deleteUser:id=>api.delete("/users/".concat(id))};
